root.name: Greg Hastings Paintball 2
root.description: OverviewPaintball gaming doesn't get much better than this. Assemble an amazing team of real players, load up with the latest in revolutionary gear and guns. And experience the unpredictable elements on 62 massive fields based of real world locations.Greg Hastings Paintball 2 features real life paint ball fields and Downloadable Content is being planned but no release date has been set.
